head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FINELL, CONNIE LYN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FINELL, CONNIE LYN

block.p: FINELL--Connie Lyn, 49 of Westport, CT, on March 23, 2007. Beloved wife of Mark, devoted mother of Marissa, Laura and Rebecca, daughter of Carl Fruehling and the late Patricia, sister of Carl, Jr., Brian and James Fruehling. Service Tuesday, March 27th at 10:00 AM, Green Funeral Home, 88 Beach Rd., Fairfield, CT. Contributions to Smilow Family Breast Health Center, Norwalk Hospital.
